org.osmdroid.tileprovider
Class ExpirableBitmapDrawable

java.lang.Object
  android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      android.graphics.drawable.BitmapDrawable
          org.osmdroid.tileprovider.ExpirableBitmapDrawable

public class ExpirableBitmapDrawable
extends android.graphics.drawable.BitmapDrawable

A BitmapDrawable for a MapTile that has a state to indicate that it's expired.
